org.diylc.components
Class AbstractComponent<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.diylc.components.AbstractComponent<T>
Type Parameters:
T -
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, IDIYComponent<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractTransparentComponent
public abstract class AbstractComponent<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDIYComponent<T>

Abstract implementation of IDIYComponent that contains component name and toString. IMPORTANT: to improve performance, all fields except for Point and Point arrays should be immutable. Failing to comply with this can result in annoying and hard to trace bugs.

Author:
Branislav Stojkovic
See Also:
Serialized Form

public boolean canControlPointOverlap(int index)
Specified by:
canControlPointOverlap in interface IDIYComponent<T>
Returns:
true, if the specified control point may overlap with other control points of the same component. The other control point must be able to overlap too.
